definition: (used with regard to idealized country life) idyllically rustic, a short poem descriptive of rural or pastoral life
details:
adjective
- (used with regard to idealized country life) idyllically rustic
= synonyms: arcadian
- relating to shepherds or herdsmen or devoted to raising sheep or cattle
= synonyms: pastoral
noun
- a short poem descriptive of rural or pastoral life
= synonyms: eclogue, idyll, idyl
- a country person
= synonyms: provincial
